data.author: Lignite

changelog.release_notes: Fixed not being able to open settings

Added support for Pebble 2
Fixed settings page not opening

Welcome to the 2016 Holiday season! :)

-Fixed celsius not working
-Fixed weather not updating sometimes
-Added live settings! Change any setting you'd like instantly, no need to hit "Save Changes" every single time anymore.
-Fixed weather not working for GPS users (RIP OpenStreetMap reverse-lookup, we will miss you)

-Fix weather by GPS not working (rest in peace Yahoo location lookup API, you will be missed)

YQL Location Lookup API
~2008-2016
"select * from tears;"
-Fixed some users not being able to get rid of the trial disappearing warning

Introducing Lignite 2.0.

Completely rewritten from the ground up, there's no need for a companion app anymore.
-Layout improvements
-Fixed weather options not changing for some users
This is the end
-Not sure why it's crashing for some users but here is a possible fix sorry folks
-Fix crashes for Android users probably

-Fix some issues with weather (saying "error" for some users)
-Layout improvements

-Fixed issues with saving weather details
-Fixed battery life drain for users not using snowflakes
-Improve layout for square screens

-Added boxes behind weather
-Improved layout

-Fixed settings failing to load on chalk devices
-Fixed settings being broken sometimes
-Fix crash

-Fixed weather not updating
-Fixed celsius and custom location not going through
-Potentially fixed battery life issues
-Potentially fixed all crashes

-Add snowflake effect (disabled by default)
-Add snowflake effect in settings
-Fix issue with time
-Fix crash
-Improve layout

data.description:
Holidays is the perfect face for your holiday season!

Beautifully designed for 3 states: day, evening, and night. You can see the weather as well before going out into those chilly conditions!

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed not being able to open settings

data.title: Holidays
